(Oh, Slawdogg. Wow.  Mafia base go down hole!)



Oblitertron/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Sixshot/Unitron/Serpentor:




Oblitertron pounded a gigantic fist against his equally large chest, and let 
out an evil cackle.  "MAFIA HAS BEEN OBLITERATRED."  The gestalt turned his 
body, walking off in large strides, heading for the Alliance base.

---

Demon Wulf and Flesh Ripper transformed to beast mode, padding off after 
Oblitertron.

---

Dark Claw transformed to his war-vehicle mode, driving off towards the 
Alliance base.

---

Unitron flew off towards the Alliance Base.

---

Sixshot walked over to Minion, who transformed into robot mode.  Transforming 
to tank mode, Minion inside of him, Sixshot powered up his treads and headed 
for the Alliance Base, leaving Shockwave broken and battered.
